004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.CommandGroupBase.registerGroupedCommands;
008import static edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.CommandGroupBase.requireUngrouped;
009
010/**
011 * A command that runs another command repeatedly, restarting it when it ends, until this command is
012 * interrupted. While this class does not extend {@link CommandGroupBase}, it is still considered a
013 * CommandGroup, as it allows one to compose another command within it; the command instances that
014 * are passed to it cannot be added to any other groups, or scheduled individually.
015 *
016 * <p>As a rule, CommandGroups require the union of the requirements of their component commands.
017 *
018 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
019 */
020public class RepeatCommand extends CommandBase {
021  protected final Command m_command;
022  private boolean m_ended;
023
024  /**
025   * Creates a new RepeatCommand. Will run another command repeatedly, restarting it whenever it
026   * ends, until this command is interrupted.
027   *
028   * @param command the command to run repeatedly
029   */
030  public RepeatCommand(Command command) {
031    requireUngrouped(command);
032    registerGroupedCommands(command);
033    m_command = command;
034    m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
035  }
036
037  @Override
038  public void initialize() {
039    m_ended = false;
040    m_command.initialize();
041  }
042
043  @Override
044  public void execute() {
045    if (m_ended) {
046      m_ended = false;
047      m_command.initialize();
048    }
049    m_command.execute();
050    if (m_command.isFinished()) {
051      // restart command
052      m_command.end(false);
053      m_ended = true;
054    }
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public boolean isFinished() {
059    return false;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
064    m_command.end(interrupted);
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
069    return m_command.runsWhenDisabled();
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public InterruptionBehavior getInterruptionBehavior() {
074    return m_command.getInterruptionBehavior();
075  }
076}
